full_summary:
### Cell, Electrocatalyst Tender Announcement

**Notice Type**
* Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Reference Information**
* Solicitation Number: W8482-231237/A
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: February 20, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: March 24, 2023, 2:00:00 PM (local time)

**Contract Details**
* **Government of Canada's Notice of Proposed Procurement**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the procurement of cell, electrocatalyst items.
* **Item Description**
The DND is seeking a total of 6 units, 3 for each contract ID (C9855 and C9856) of the following items:
	+ Part Number: SA15MXBCT
	+ NCAGE: 1D1T5
	+ Exceeds Technologies International Corporation (dba Excel Tec)
	+ Description: Cells, Electrocatalyst
* **Note for Bidders**
	* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
	* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.

**Attachments**
The following attachments are available on the Canadabuys website:

* W8482-231237 Amendment 001 *ENG.pdf
* W8482-231237 Amendment 001 *FRA.pdf
* W8482-231237 English RFPClauses.pdf
* W8482-231237 French RFPClauses.pdf

**Official Languages**
Documentation may be submitted in either official language of Canada. 

Contact Information:
Anthony Lemoine-Hoefsmit
anthony.lemoine-hoefsmit@forces.gc.ca
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

### Commercial Opportunities
 The following trade agreements apply to this tender announcement:
	-. Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement 
	-. Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	-. Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPA)
	-. Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	-. Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	-. Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA))
	-. Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	-. Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
